qas.question: What type of secondary schools does Guinea-Bissau have?
What institutions have added a Faculty of Law?
What institutions have added a Faculty of Medicine?
What two words are used to describe the Faculty of Law and Faculty of Medicine?

context: Guinea-Bissau has several secondary schools (<a0_0>general as well as technical<a0_0/>) and a number of <a1_0><a2_0>universities<a2_0/><a1_0/>, to which an <a3_0>institutionally autonomous<a3_0/> Faculty of Law as well as a Faculty of Medicine have been added.
